Detailed Description

This interface provides configuration of the collector.

Member Function Documentation

int org::ipdr::api::configuration::CollectorConfigI::getAcceptTimeout (   ) 
 

Returns accept timeout. The accept timeout is used by ListeningSocketHandler to check for shutdown requests periodically rather than hang on the server socket indefinitely.

Returns:
value of the accept timeout

boolean org::ipdr::api::configuration::CollectorConfigI::isStrictTemplates (   )
